post.summary: Writes one or more relation tuples in a single transaction.

RelationTupleDeltaAction.description:
- ACTION_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified.
The `WriteRelationTuplesTxn` rpc ignores this
RelationTupleDelta if an action was unspecified.
 - ACTION_INSERT: Insertion of a new RelationTuple.
It is ignored if already existing.
 - ACTION_DELETE: Deletion of the RelationTuple.
It is ignored if it does not exist.

namespace.description: The namespace this relation tuple lives in.

object.description:
The object related by this tuple.
Objects live within the namespace of the tuple.

relation.description: The relation between an Object and a Subject.

subject.description:
The subject related by this tuple.
A Subject either represents a concrete subject id or
a SubjectSet that expands to more Subjects.

v1alpha1RelationTuple.description:
RelationTuple relates an Object with a Subject.

While a tuple reflects a relationship between Object
and Subject, they do not completely define the effective ACLs.

action.description: The action to do on the RelationTuple.

id.description: A concrete id of the subject.

set.description:
A subject set that expands to more Subjects
(used for inheritance).

v1alpha1Subject.description:
Subject is either a concrete subject id or
a subject set expanding to more Subjects.

namespace.description:
The namespace of the object and relation
referenced in this subject set.

object.description: The object selected by the subjects.

relation.description: The relation to the object by the subjects.

v1alpha1SubjectSet.description:
SubjectSet refers to all subjects which have
the same `relation` to an `object`.
It is also used for inheritance.

relationTupleDeltas.description:
The write delta for the relation tuples operated in one single transaction.
Either all actions commit or no changes take effect on error.

The tuple's etag is used for a consistent read-modify-write request flow.
If the etag is not present, the tuple is not validated against the state
of the serverside tuple.

v1alpha1WriteRelationTuplesTxnRequest.description: The request of a WriteService.WriteRelationTuplesTxn rpc.

snaptokens.description:
The list of the new latest snapshot tokens of the affected RelationTuple,
with the same index as specified in the `relation_tuple_deltas` field of
the WriteRelationTuplesTxnRequest request.

If the RelationTupleDelta_Action was DELETE
the snaptoken is empty at the same index.

v1alpha1WriteRelationTuplesTxnResponse.description: The response of a WriteService.WriteRelationTuplesTxn rpc.
